name: Roast Beef Meal
short_description: Tender roast beef with vegetables and gravy
description: Our signature roast beef meal features premium cuts slow-roasted to perfection, served with seasonal vegetables and rich gravy. Restaurant-quality meal ready to heat and enjoy.

name: Roast Lamb Meal
short_description: Succulent roast lamb with vegetables and gravy
description: Premium lamb roasted with herbs and spices, accompanied by fresh vegetables and homemade gravy. A gourmet meal that brings fine dining to your table.

name: Corned Beef Meal
description: Classic corned beef meal prepared the traditional way, tender and flavorful with perfectly cooked vegetables. A hearty, satisfying meal ready in minutes.

name: Chicken Gravy Meal
short_description: Tender chicken in rich gravy with vegetables
description: Succulent chicken pieces in our homemade rich gravy, served with garden vegetables. A comforting, restaurant-quality meal that's ready when you are.

name: Chicken Boscaiola Meal
short_description: Creamy chicken with mushrooms and bacon
description: Gourmet chicken boscaiola featuring tender chicken, mushrooms, and bacon in a creamy sauce. An Italian-inspired ready meal that delivers restaurant flavors at home.

name: Lasagna
description: Our signature lasagna features layers of pasta, rich beef ragù, creamy béchamel, and melted cheese. Made from scratch using traditional Italian methods for authentic flavor.

name: Beef Bacon Red Wine & Pepper Pie
short_description: Premium beef with bacon in red wine sauce
description: Gourmet pie filled with tender beef, crispy bacon, and cracked pepper in a rich red wine reduction. Encased in golden, flaky pastry for the ultimate pie experience.

name: Steak Dianne Pie
description: Succulent steak pieces in our signature Dianne sauce with mushrooms and brandy. A restaurant-quality pie that brings fine dining flavors to your home.

name: Steak & Mushroom Pie
description: Traditional favorite featuring tender steak and fresh mushrooms in rich gravy, wrapped in buttery pastry. A timeless classic made with premium ingredients.

name: Guinness Pie
description: Hearty beef slow-cooked in Guinness stout with onions and herbs. A rich, deeply flavored pie inspired by Irish pub classics.

name: Steak & Kidney Pie
short_description: Traditional steak and kidney in rich gravy
description: Classic British pie with tender steak and kidney in a rich, savory gravy. Made using time-honored recipes for authentic, comforting flavor.

name: Roast Lamb & Minted Pea Pie
short_description: Tender lamb with mint and peas
description: Premium roast lamb combined with minted peas in a light gravy. A refreshing twist on traditional lamb pie with bright, garden-fresh flavors.

name: Moroccan Lamb & Sweet Potato Pie
description: Exotic gourmet pie featuring tender lamb slow-cooked with Moroccan spices, sweet potato, and aromatic herbs. A fusion of traditional pie-making and North African flavors.

name: Lamb Shank Pie
short_description: Slow-cooked lamb shank in rich gravy
description: Luxurious pie filled with fork-tender lamb shank that's been slow-cooked to perfection in red wine and herbs. Premium comfort food at its finest.

name: Chicken Curry Pie
short_description: Mild curry chicken in flaky pastry
description: Tender chicken pieces in a fragrant, mildly spiced curry sauce. Perfect balance of traditional pie comfort with exotic curry flavors.

name: Chicken Satay Pie
short_description: Chicken in creamy peanut satay sauce
description: Succulent chicken in our homemade satay sauce with a hint of peanut and Asian spices. A unique fusion pie that's become a customer favorite.

name: Chicken, Mushroom & Leek Pie
short_description: Creamy chicken with mushrooms and leeks
description: Gourmet chicken pie with sautéed mushrooms and tender leeks in a creamy sauce. Elegant flavors wrapped in golden, buttery pastry.

name: Chicken & Vegetable Pie
description: Healthy and delicious pie filled with tender chicken and a medley of fresh vegetables in light gravy. Family-friendly comfort food made with care.

name: Pepper Sauce (Large)
description: Our signature restaurant-quality pepper sauce made with cracked peppercorns, cream, and brandy. Perfect for steak, chicken, or any grilled meat. Large 500ml container.

name: Pepper Sauce (Small)
description: Our signature restaurant-quality pepper sauce made with cracked peppercorns, cream, and brandy. Perfect for steak, chicken, or any grilled meat. Small 250ml container.

name: Mushroom Sauce (Large)
description: Gourmet mushroom sauce with fresh mushrooms, cream, and herbs. Restaurant-quality sauce that transforms any meal. Large 500ml container.

name: Mushroom Sauce (Small)
description: Gourmet mushroom sauce with fresh mushrooms, cream, and herbs. Restaurant-quality sauce that transforms any meal. Small 250ml container.

name: Dianne Sauce (Large)
description: Rich Dianne sauce with mushrooms, cream, and a hint of brandy. The perfect accompaniment to steak and chicken. Large 500ml container.

name: Dianne Sauce (Small)
description: Rich Dianne sauce with mushrooms, cream, and a hint of brandy. The perfect accompaniment to steak and chicken. Small 250ml container.

name: Boscaiola Sauce (Large)
description: Italian-style boscaiola sauce with bacon, mushrooms, and cream. Adds gourmet flavor to chicken, pasta, or beef. Large 500ml container.

name: Boscaiola Sauce (Small)
description: Italian-style boscaiola sauce with bacon, mushrooms, and cream. Adds gourmet flavor to chicken, pasta, or beef. Small 250ml container.

name: Pumpkin Soup
description: Velvety smooth pumpkin soup made from fresh roasted pumpkin, cream, and aromatic spices. A warming, nutritious soup that's restaurant-quality and ready to heat.

name: Pea & Ham Soup
description: Traditional pea and ham soup with tender ham pieces, split peas, and vegetables. A comforting, protein-rich soup made the old-fashioned way.

name: Potato & Leek Soup
description: Classic potato and leek soup with a silky texture and delicate flavors. Made fresh with quality ingredients for a wholesome, satisfying meal.

name: Curry Chicken Container
description: Large container of our popular curry chicken with tender pieces in aromatic curry sauce. Perfect for family meals or entertaining. Serves 4-6 people.

name: Satay Chicken Container
description: Large container of succulent chicken in our homemade peanut satay sauce. A crowd-pleasing meal ready to heat and serve. Serves 4-6 people.

name: Chicken, Mushroom & Leek Container
description: Large container of gourmet chicken with mushrooms and leeks in creamy sauce. Restaurant-quality family meal ready in minutes. Serves 4-6 people.
